data.trans: Làm rạng rỡ, làm bừng sáng
data.trans_hint: Nụ cười của cô ấy làm bừng sáng cả khuôn mặt.
data.en_hint: Her smile brightens up her face.
data.content_game_1: Her smile brightens up her face.
data.answer_en_hint: Her smile brightens up her face.

data.trans_hint: Họ ngồi nhìn mặt trời mọc.
data.en_hint: They sat and watched the sun come up.
data.content_game_1: They sat and watched the sun come up.
data.answer_en_hint: They sat and watched the sun come up.

data.trans_hint: Chúng tôi bắt đầu di chuyển từ Hà Nội, sau đó chúng tôi lái xe đến Mộc Châu, nơi cách đó 160 km, và từ đó chúng tôi vượt qua biên giới và sang thăm Lào.
data.en_hint: We started off in Hanoi, then we drove to Moc Chau, which is 160 km away, and from there we crossed the border and visited Laos.
data.content_game_1: We started off in Hanoi, then we drove to Moc Chau, which is 160 km away, and from there we crossed the border and visited Laos.
data.answer_en_hint: We started off in Hanoi, then we drove to Moc Chau, which is 160 km away, and from there we crossed the border and visited Laos.

data.trans_hint: Gió đã mạnh lên từ sáng nay.
data.en_hint: The wind has picked up since this morning.
data.content_game_1: The wind has picked up since this morning.
data.answer_en_hint: The wind has picked up since this morning.

data.trans: Làm cho ai không kịp trở tay
data.trans_hint: Lũ lụt giữa mùa khô khiến bao người dân không kịp trở tay khi mà họ không có đủ thời gian để sơ tán.
data.en_hint: Floods during dry season caught a lot of people out when they couldn't have enough time to evacuate.
data.content_game_1: Floods during dry season caught a lot of people out when they couldn't have enough time to evacuate.
data.answer_en_hint: Floods during dry season caught a lot of people out when they couldn't have enough time to evacuate.

data.trans_hint: Trời nhiều mây suốt cả một ngày.
data.en_hint: It's been clouding over all day.
data.content_game_1: It's been clouding over all day.
data.answer_en_hint: It's been clouding over all day.

data.trans_hint: Ánh sáng mờ mờ bắt đầu xuất hiện sau làn mây khi cơn mưa lớn đã qua đi.
data.en_hint: Faint light started to come out of the sun after a heavy rain.
data.content_game_1: Faint light started to come out of the sun after a heavy rain.
data.answer_en_hint: Faint light started to come out of the sun after a heavy rain.

data.trans: Hết ngày này qua ngày khác
data.trans_hint: Tuyết đã rơi hết ngày này qua ngày khác suốt từ đầu tháng 10.
data.en_hint: It has been snowing day after day since the beginning of November.
data.content_game_1: It has been snowing day after day since the beginning of November.
data.answer_en_hint: It has been snowing day after day since the beginning of November.

data.trans_hint: Khi thời tiết đẹp, các ngư dân có thể ra khơi thuận lợi mỗi ngày.
data.en_hint: When the weather is benign, anglers can smoothly sail to the sea from day to day.
data.content_game_1: When the weather is benign, anglers can smoothly sail to the sea from day to day.
data.answer_en_hint: When the weather is benign, anglers can smoothly sail to the sea from day to day.

data.trans_hint: Trăng đã tàn để nhường chỗ cho mặt trời ngó rạng chào đón một ngày mới.
data.en_hint: The moon has gone down to make room for the sun to come out welcoming a brand new day.
data.content_game_1: The moon has gone down to make room for the sun to come out welcoming a brand new day.
data.answer_en_hint: The moon has gone down to make room for the sun to come out welcoming a brand new day.

data.trans_hint: Trời thường mưa xối xả vào những tháng mùa hè.
data.en_hint: It often pours with rain in some summer months.
data.content_game_1: It often pours with rain in some summer months.
data.answer_en_hint: It often pours with rain in some summer months.
